archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0851
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to be able to link any destination IPs back to the user account which accessed it (especially sites where NETSAFE, DIA, OCEANZ & INTERPOL have flagged harmful digital communications/abuse/child trafficking/paedophilia and child grooming is known to occur) by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
